name: Hot meal
description:
It’s like you hit the jackpot. But, don’t forget that you need to play to win! And your visit to the witch to solve your problem was like the lottery. Now, any girl you meet is yours! Well, almost. You’ll have to put in a little bit of effort anyway. Where to go now? Any villager knows that! Let’s move on! To town!
Support us on PATREON
